abstract: Unbound collection of texts on occult sciences, in different hands and on papers from various provenance and format. See individual records for more details.
contents: 1. Item 1 : Risālah fī ʻilm al-zāyirjah al-ramlīyah ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl.
2. Item 2 : al-Risālah al-mastūr li-inshirāḥ al-ṣudūr / ʻUmar Mīr al-Liwāʾ.
3. Item 3 : al-Ḥāshiyah al-ikhtiṣārīyah al-ramlīyah al-falakīyah / ʻAlī ibn Ḥasan al-Jazāʾirlī.
4. Item 4 : Risālah fī al-raml / Jaʻfar al-Ṣādiq.
5. Item 5 : Risālah fī al-khātam al-miʾīnī ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl.
7. Item 7 : Hādhā Kitāb al-Shiʻrah al-Yamānīyah wa-Malḥamat Dāniyāl / al-Ḥakīm Hirmis.
subject: Divination—Religious aspects—Islam—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
